wikipedia_page.main: Katherine Louise Diana Amess ( AY-miss; born 19 July 1985) is an English actress and model. She has appeared in many British television commercials and has had several film and television roles.

response: A Roman Catholic who opposed abortion and same-sex marriage, his socially-conservative political views included support for the reintroduction of capital punishment. On the issue of the United Kingdom's membership of the European Union (EU), he was in favour of leaving on grounds of parliamentary sovereignty and removing supremacy of EU law. He married in 1983, and had five children, including actress Katie Amess.
Their eldest daughter is actress Katie Amess.
